scripts.build:
rm -rf frontend && mkdir -p frontend && if [ -f ../frontend/package.json ]; then cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build || true; fi && if [ -d ../frontend/dist ]; then cp -r ../frontend/dist/* ../backend/frontend/; elif [ -d ../frontend/build ]; then cp -r ../frontend/build/* ../backend/frontend/; elif [ -d ../frontend/public ]; then cp -r ../frontend/public/* ../backend/frontend/; else mkdir -p ./frontend && echo 'SwiftStay

SwiftStay is running

' > ./frontend/index.html; fi

scripts.postinstall: cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
